Package databasemodel.modelinterfaces

Interface RentingModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RentingModel
public interface RentingModelInterface
Interface to create Renting objects getting them from a database in SQL.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Renting createRentingOffer​(Renting renting)
    The method adds the Renting object to the database Renting schema.
    void deleteRenting​(Renting renting)
    The method deletes the Renting object from the database Renting schema.
    RentingList getAllRentings()
    The method returns all the available rentings from the Renting schema.
    RentingList getAllRentingsByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
    The method returns all the renting deals by a username.
    void publishFeedBack​(java.lang.String role, java.lang.String feedback, Renting renting)
    The method adds to the database a feedback about landlord and vice versa after a deal is closed.
    Renting readById​(int id)
    The method returns an Renting object from the database Renting schema.
    java.util.List<Renting> readByRentingName​(java.lang.String searchString)
    The method returns a list of Renting objects with the same title from the database Offer schema.
    void updateRenting​(Renting renting)
    The method updates the Renting object from the database Renting schema.

  • Method Details

    • createRentingOffer

      Renting createRentingOffer​(Renting renting) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method adds the Renting object to the database Renting schema.
      Parameters:
      renting - The renting to be added.
      Returns:
      The Offer if the action is done successfully, null if not.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • readById

      Renting readById​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns an Renting object from the database Renting schema.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Renting.
      Returns:
      The Renting with the indicated id.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • getAllRentings

      RentingList getAllRentings() throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns all the available rentings from the Renting schema.
      Returns:
      The RentingList containing all the offers.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • getAllRentingsByUsername

      RentingList getAllRentingsByUsername​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns all the renting deals by a username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      RentingList object from the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • readByRentingName

      java.util.List<Renting> readByRentingName​(java.lang.String searchString) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns a list of Renting objects with the same title from the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      searchString - The title of the renting.
      Returns:
      The Renting with a similar title.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • updateRenting

      void updateRenting​(Renting renting) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method updates the Renting object from the database Renting schema.
      Parameters:
      renting - The renting.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • deleteRenting

      void deleteRenting​(Renting renting) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method deletes the Renting object from the database Renting schema.
      Parameters:
      renting - The renting to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • publishFeedBack

      void publishFeedBack​(java.lang.String role, java.lang.String feedback, Renting renting) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method adds to the database a feedback about landlord and vice versa after a deal is closed.
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the user.
      feedback - The feedback to be added.
      renting - The renting that have to be updated to.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database
